# Gold Standard Gates Checklist

## Quality gates

- [ ] Tests pass
- [ ] Lint/type/static checks pass
- [ ] Architecture and docs consistency checks pass

## Security gates

- [ ] SAST/dependency checks pass
- [ ] ASVS target control checks captured
- [ ] High/critical findings triaged with owner and due date

## Supply-chain gates

- [ ] Build provenance/attestation produced
- [ ] SBOM generated and attached
- [ ] Release verification checklist completed

## Decision record

- Gate decision:
- Exceptions approved by:
- Follow-up actions:
